articles.title: Weathering life's storms: How to regulate your emotions at work amid tough times
articles.content: Weeks earlier, her father-in-law had suffered a stroke and her two children were just starting their year-end examinations. "I felt that the demands were impossible for me to bear," said Ms Veenaa. "My mind was in a constant loop of: 'Who needs me most right now?". However, Ms Veenaa realised that venting was not always...

articles.title: Man breaks into Geylang HDB flat but gets nothing; arrested in 5 hours
articles.content: The incident happened at about 6.32pm at a residential unit along Pine Close in Geylang. Checks online by AsiaOne indicate that the area is a HDB precinct. No items were reported stolen. He will be taken to court on Saturday and charged with housebreaking
